name: Citlali
desc:
"Obsidian Opalstar" Citlali

The vivid night-wind flows, obsidian reflects the heart.

value.name: Mamaloaco's Frigid Rain
value.desc:
Citlali: Mamaloaco's Frigid Rain

"Citlalin, Itzpapa, get 'em!"

value.text: Reward for inviting Citlali to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Citlali
value.desc: The great shaman from the Masters of the Night-Wind, the universally-revered Granny Itztli.

customize.name: Citlali
customize.desc:
"Obsidian Opalstar" Citlali

The vivid night-wind flows, obsidian reflects the heart.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Sâ€”Since you put it that way... fine, Granny will humor you with a game."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Citlali's deck is built around the Select mechanic and Nightsoul points. She excels at performing a large number of Coordinated Attacks.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Lyney

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> .
Enters <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> , gains 1 <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul point</color> , and creates 1 point of <color=#ffffff>Opal Shield</color> and <color=#ffffff>Itzpapa</color> . (This skill cannot be used after the character enters <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> )
<color=#ece5d8>Nightsoul's Blessing</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
The character to which this is attached accumulates <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul points</color> . (Max 2 points)
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Opal Shield</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
Grants <color=#ffffff>1 Shield point</color> to your active character. (Can stack)
<color=#ece5d8>Itzpapa</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After your characters take DMG:</color> Deduct 1 <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul point</color> from <color=#ffffff>Citlali</color> and create 1 stack of <color=#ffffff>Opal Shield</color> .
When <color=#ffffff>Citlali</color> gains <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul points</color> and her <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul points</color> reach 2, prioritize dealing 1 <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> to the opponent's active character.
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 2 <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> , deals 1 <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters on standby, and, if possible, gains 2 <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul points</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
<color=#ffffff>After you Select or deal DMG with an Elemental Reaction:</color> If possible, gain 1 <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul point</color> . (Once per Round)

Applies Cryo and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG+1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Frozen</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives Physical or Pyro DMG, in which case they will take +2 DMG)

<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
<color=#ece5d8>Shield</color>
This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.
<color=#ece5d8>Piercing DMG</color>
Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.
<color=#ece5d8>Select</color>
Select 1 card from a specific number of cards and activate its effects.
